name: The Adventures Of Jimmy (V20X)
description:
Jimmy is in a very mysterious place unaware of how he got there.

I made this at a coding camp in 2018. It is a little buggy.  Try speedrunning it!!

To see current speedruns click here: https://sites.google.com/view/adventuresofjimmyspeedrun/home?authuser=0

Controls:

W= Jump

A,D= Left,Right

Point and Left Click = Shoot
